name: live-poll-bot
description: Live Poll Bot - Real-time polling application with microservices architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "api,realtime,bot" -c "blue,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:realtime" "npm run dev:bot"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n "api,realtime,bot,frontend" -c "blue,magenta,yellow,green" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:realtime" "npm run dev:bot" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:realtime && npm run build:bot
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/api-service && npm install && cd ../realtime-service && npm install && cd ../bot-service && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend/poll-app && npm install && cd ../admin-app && npm install
